description:
Levels of the overall public budget

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
71321 Annual debt of the overall public budget

Definition:
This variable comprises the classification of the overall
public budget by the following levels.
- Länder
- municipalities / associations of municipalities
This is the part of the overall public budget that can be
regionalised.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Levels of the overall public budget
